Head Guards are elite versions of the Shayzien guards and are found around the kingdom of Kourend. They wield a dragon longsword along with a dragon sq shield, and wear Shayzien armour.

Safespotting[edit | edit source]

The Kourend head guard safespot.

You can lure a Kourend head guard to the crate north of the bank in the middle of the Shayzien camp.

Another safespot is 9 squares south and 2 squares east of the pictured spot. The spears planted in the ground act as the barrier to shoot over.

Safespot for three Kourend head guards.

Another spot with multiple Kourend head guards is just north of Kourend Castle. Head north, past the secondary wall, and then immediately go west towards the first trebuchet at the defensive position. You safespot behind the crate against the castle wall, with three Kourend head guards spawning in the area, as shown in the picture.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • On release Kourend head guards had rune scimitars and rune kiteshields equipped.
